fool.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a stupid person or someone who has done something stupid
fool.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
fool.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a man whose job was to entertain a king or other powerful people in the past, by doing tricks, singing funny songs etc
fool.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to trick someone into believing something that is not true
fool.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: You can’t fool me with that old excuse.
I was fooled into believing their promises.
fool.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: What did you say a fool thing like that for?
